autobuild:
<command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=ACE_wrappers/include/makeinclude/platform_macros.GNU output='include $(ACE_ROOT)/include/makeinclude/platform_linux.GNU
debug=0
exceptions=0
rt_corba=1
smart_proxies=1
interface_repo=1
interceptors=1
ssl=1
xt_reactor=1
fl_reactor=0
tk_reactor=1
qt_reactor=0
gtk_reactor=1
optimize=1
debug=0
inline=0

# Override -Wno-uninitiialized to verify that uninitialized variable
# warnings actually work properly when exception handling is
# enabled in g++ 3.2.

CCFLAGS += -Wuninitialized

# Perform some stricter C/C++ checking using the -pedantic flag, but
# disable the long long warnings since we need to support that type
# in ACE/TAO.
CCFLAGS += -pedantic -Wno-long-long -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-align

OCFLAGS=-O

CC=gcc-3.2
CXX=g++-3.2

# For 
CPPFLAGS += -I/usr/src/linux/include

# For QT headers
PLATFORM_QT_CPPFLAGS = -I/usr/include/qt

# For TK headers
PLATFORM_TK_CPPFLAGS = -I/usr/include/tcl8.3

# For TCL library
PLATFORM_TK_LIBS += -ltcl8.3

# Additional XtReactor flags
PLATFORM_XT_LIBS += -lXm

'" />
